rooms.description: Open and inviting space for family gatherings, with large windows to bring in natural light.
Well-equipped kitchen designed following Vastu principles, with ample storage spaces.
Spacious bedroom with a balcony for relaxation and fresh air.
Quiet space dedicated to reading, learning, and enjoying the company of books.
Well-lit and ventilated bathroom equipped with modern fixtures.

openings.description: Large garden surrounding the cottage to provide ample green space and natural light.
